name: Puffy-Poyo
author: Zuhaitz
description:
A
 large palette with a lot of variety, created with the purpose of 
drawing characters and fanarts. Even though I used it a lot for 
characters, it can also be used for props and backgrounds. The palette 
was originally created to draw my OC Puffy and Kirby, and that's why is 
called 'Puffy Poyo'. Fun fact, 'Poyo' also sounds like chicken in 
spanish, so it's kinda funny.
